text: Sinatra was just one of Mom's friends.
author: Lorna Luft

text: My mom is not trying to live vicariously through me.
author: Victoria Justice

text: I was almost 8 years old when I was watching a kid on a TV commercial, and I told my mom that I wanted to do the same thing. She said that I would need to get an agent and that she would research it.
author: Victoria Justice

text: I'd say that if you had a strained relationship with your mom, for whatever reason, the best thing to do is be open with each other, talk it over, try and work it out somehow as opposed to just putting a wall up and pushing them away.
author: Victoria Justice

text: My mom's a social worker, and my dad works in non-profit organisations.
author: Seth Rogen
